description: This file is a complete HTML document for a web-based database visualizer user interface. It contains markup, styling, and client-side JavaScript to display databases, tables, and table data dynamically fetched from backend API endpoints.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases from the API.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table, handling pagination and empty state.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data with headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content, especially for long text or objects.
